original_title: 側田 Justin Around The World Tour 2011
overview: To pursue new career opportunities, Justin Lo decided that he should move his base to Beijing. Bidding an emotional farewell to the Hong Kong music scene, the singer-songwriter entertained his fans one last time at the Hong Kong Coliseum with two concerts in late January 2011. A number of top musicians and interesting artists participated in the concerts, including producer Mark Lui, guitarist Joey Tang, Justin's musician uncle Ted Lo, and guest performers C AllStar and Wan Kwong. The concert rundown comprised a variety of music genres and styles, including some re-arranged versions of Justin's most popular songs.
title: 側田 Justin Around The World Tour 2011
